name: EAR_ITM_UPD
description: This table contains guarantor item update information for a particular guarantor account item's last update. Columns included are the guarantor item to which the update information relates, the user that last updated this item, and the instant that the last update occurred. Note that the actual guarantor account item value is not included in this table: only details of the last update to the item are included.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the guarantor account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPD_ITM_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the guarantor item number to which the update information for User (I EAR 2032) and Instant (I EAR 2033) relates.

columns.name: UPD_USER_ID
columns.description: This item contains the user (EMP) ID that entered the last update for the guarantor item number (I EAR 2031).

columns.name: UPD_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPD_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the instant in UTC time that the last update was made to the guarantor item number (I EAR 2031).
